{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10269v1", "title": "Multiple solutions to asymptotically linear problems driven by
  superposition operators", "summary": "In this paper, we investigate the existence and multiplicity of weak
solutions to problems involving a superposition operator of the type
$$\int_{[0, 1]}(- \Delta)^s u d \mu(s),$$ for a signed measure $\mu$ on the
interval of fractional exponents $[0,1]$, when the nonlinearity is subcritical
and asymptotically linear at infinity; thus, we deal with a perturbation of the
eigenvalue problem for the superposition operator. We use variational tools,
extending to this setting well-known results for the classical and the
fractional Laplace operators.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-14T14:34:38Z"}
